title: Meditation Creativity Peace
overview: This documentary shot by film students follows David Lynch on a 16-country tour of Europe, the Middle East, and Latin America to spread the word about the individual and global impact of meditation.  Meditation, Creativity, Peace shows the director’s commitment to Transcendental Meditation as way of changing the world, starting from within.  The film also offers insight into Lynch’s creative process, through interviews and revealing moments from the tour.
